name: Evil Maze 2 | 惡魔迷宮 2
description: This is a retro random strategy ARPG. Rich hidden elements, random props, random magic, random maze It's a different experience for everyone to play games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: intel Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT) Processor: 1.6 GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NIVIDIA OR AMD DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound +
